verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

“\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w brings|strong="H7126"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* animal \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H6186"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w arrange|strong="H6186"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, including \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fat|strong="H6309"\w*, \w atop|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* burning \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

If, however, \w one|strong="H4480"\w*’s \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w is|strong="H7133"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*—\w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*—\w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H7133"\w* \w to|strong="H7126"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H7819"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* splatter \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w sides|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H4196"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H4725"\w* \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w crop|strong="H4760"\w* \w with|strong="H4196"\w* \w its|strong="H5493"\w* contents \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H7993"\w* \w to|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w*.
